name: Break Out
description:
BREAK OUT

Break Out is a first person adventure game, where you need to pay attention to every detail.

Your objective is to get out of the maze as fast as you can, in any way possible... A deep secret awaits those that can beat the fastest time.

INSTRUCTIONS

WASD - move

mouse - look

E - interact

Shift - run

Space - jump

esc - pause/achievements menu

CREDITS
